choose a domain & hosting, install a code editor (like vs code), create a folder, add an index.html for structure, style.css for design, script.js for interactivity, link them, write html tags, style with css, add javascript functionality, test in a browser, optimize for mobile, validate code, deploy using github pages or a web host, and promote the site.
